forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain late. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain this afternoon. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. N winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. NNE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
